update TBL_ECOLOGICAL_POVERTY
DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATION_HOUSEHOLD = #{relationHousehold,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POVERTY_NAME = #{povertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RETURN_FOREST = #{isReturnForest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RETURN_FOREST_GRANT = #{returnForestGrant,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

FOREST_RANGEREMPLOY = #{forestRangeremploy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
